item.title: Why you should replace booleans with timestamps while developing
item.description: A nice programming tip you should follow while developing?

item.title: Are you good at many things? Maybe you are a Wildcard Person
item.description: A Wildcard is a person who can take on many different roles as needed.

item.title: Computational thinking
item.description: If you cannot distinguish between results from an algorithm and a human, that’s computational thinking
